description: This file defines a Redux slice for managing authentication state in a React application. It sets initial state variables such as user info, token, status, and error, and provides reducers to handle authentication actions like start, success, failure, logout, and token setting. The slice also exports actions and the reducer for integration with the Redux store.

methods.name: startAuth
methods.description: Sets authentication status to 'loading' and resets error.

methods.name: authSuccess
methods.description: Updates user and token info upon successful authentication, sets status to 'succeeded', and stores data in localStorage.

methods.name: authFailure
methods.description: Sets status to 'failed' and records error message.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears user info and token, resets status to 'idle', and removes stored auth data from localStorage.

methods.name: setToken
methods.description: Updates the authentication token in state.
